events.message: I am filing a claim for my vehicle after a collision that caused significant damage to the front bumper and headlights.
The filed claim has been categorised under Auto Accident based on the details of the car collision reported.
An agent has been assigned to handle your auto accident claim and will contact you shortly for further details.
Your claim for the vehicle collision has been acknowledged, and we appreciate your prompt reporting of the incident.
Please submit photos of the damaged vehicle and the police report related to the car accident for claim processing.
All requested documents including the accident photos and official police report have been successfully submitted.
The investigation into the automobile collision claim has started and is currently in progress with the assessment team.
The investigation has concluded with confirmation of the collision details and validation of the damages reported.
A settlement offer has been proposed based on the repair estimates and policy coverage for your vehicle accident.
We have received your feedback regarding the proposed settlement and noted your concerns about the repair timeline.
Your auto accident claim has been approved following agreement on the settlement terms and verification of documents.
The payment for the approved vehicle damage claim has been issued and should reflect in your account within three business days.
The auto accident claim has been officially closed after payment issuance, thank you for your cooperation throughout the process.
All records and correspondence for your vehicle collision claim have been archived for future reference and compliance purposes.
